resources.string: Drop, cover, and hold on. Stay away from windows and objects that can fall. Evacuate if instructed to do so. Seek shelter until the shaking stops.

Evacuate immediately and move to higher ground. Avoid low-lying areas and do not attempt to drive or walk through flooded areas. Stay tuned for updates and follow the instructions of local authorities.
Seek immediate shelter. Stay indoors and avoid windows. Stay tuned for updates and follow the instructions of local authorities.

A hurricane is approaching. Please take immediate action to secure your property and evacuate if instructed to do so by local authorities. Stay tuned for updates and follow all official evacuation orders.

A fire has been reported in the area. Evacuate immediately and proceed to a safe location. Follow the guidance of emergency services personnel and stay tuned for updates. Do not use elevators. Call 100 if you are in immediate danger.
